note.p: Italian educator, philosopher, and physician. Degree in medicine and surgery, Pisa, 1859. Professor of speculative and moral philosophy at the Regio school, Dante Alighieri, Florence, 1862–7. Professor of theoretical philosophy, Bologna, 1867.
Archivio storico della psicologia italiana (www.aspi.unimib.it/, accessed 13 January 2016
